generated_body: The article is likely to discuss the ongoing dispute between Taylor Swift and Big Machine Records regarding unpaid royalties, which her representative claims amounts to $7.9 million. The article could also touch on the implications of this dispute for artists' rights in the music industry, alongside any potential legal actions that may arise from this claim.
